tool_description: OutlookMail, send emails and manage folders.
name: OutlookMail
title: OutlookMail

api_list.name: copyFolder
api_list.description: Copy a folder and its contents to another folder

required_parameters.name: destinationId
required_parameters.description: The destination folder ID, or the Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, or DeletedItems well-known folder name.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: copyMessage
api_list.description: Copy a message to a folder.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

required_parameters.name: destinationId
required_parameters.description: The destination folder ID, or the Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, or DeletedItems well-known folder name.

api_list.name: createDraftForwardMessage
api_list.description: Create a draft of the Forward message to add a comment or recipients in one CreateForward call. You can then update message properties and send the draft.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: comment
optional_parameters.description: A comment to include. Can be an empty string.

api_list.name: createDraftMessage
api_list.description: Create a draft of a new message.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: folderId
optional_parameters.description: The folder ID, or the Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, or DeletedItems well-known folder name, if you're getting messages from a specific folder. Specifying AllItems would return all messages from the entire mailbox

api_list.name: createDraftReplyAllMessage
api_list.description: Create a draft of a reply-all message to add a comment

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: createDraftReplyMessage
api_list.description: Create a draft of a reply message to add a comment

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: createFileAttachment
api_list.description: Add a file attachment to a message.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: contentType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the attachment.

api_list.name: createFolder
api_list.description: Create a child folder by the name specified in displayName.

required_parameters.name: folderId
required_parameters.description: The folder ID, or the Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, or DeletedItems well-known folder name, if you're getting messages from a specific folder. Specifying AllItems would return all messages from the entire mailbox

required_parameters.name: displayName
required_parameters.description: The display name of the folder.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: createForwardMessage
api_list.description: Forward a message by using the Forward method and optionally specifying a comment. The message is then saved in the Sent Items folder.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: comment
optional_parameters.description: A comment to include. Can be an empty string.

api_list.name: createItemAttachment
api_list.description: Add an item attachment to a message.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: createOverrideForSender
api_list.description: Create an override for a sender identified by an SMTP address. Future messages from that SMTP address will be consistently classified as specified in the override

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

required_parameters.name: classifyAs
required_parameters.description: Specifies how incoming messages from a specific sender should always be classified as.

required_parameters.name: senderEmailAddress
required_parameters.description: The email address of the sender for whom the override is created.

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: The user's email address.

api_list.name: createReferenceAttachment
api_list.description: Add a reference attachment to a message.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

required_parameters.name: sourceUrl
required_parameters.description: URL to get the attachment content.

optional_parameters.name: permission
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the permissions granted for the attachment by the type of provider in providerType.

optional_parameters.name: contentType
optional_parameters.description: The MIME type of the attachment.

optional_parameters.name: isFolder
optional_parameters.description: Specifies whether the attachment is a link to a folder. Must set this to true if SourceUrl is a link to a folder.

optional_parameters.name: providerType
optional_parameters.description: The type of provider that supports an attachment of this contentType.

optional_parameters.name: thumbnailUrl
optional_parameters.description: Applies to only a reference attachment of an image - URL to get a thumbnail image.

optional_parameters.name: isInline
optional_parameters.description: true if the attachment is an inline attachment; otherwise, false.

optional_parameters.name: previewUrl
optional_parameters.description: Applies to only a reference attachment of an image - URL to get a preview image.

api_list.name: createSimpleDraftMessage
api_list.description: Create a draft of a new message.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: folderId
optional_parameters.description: The folder ID, or the Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, or DeletedItems well-known folder name, if you're getting messages from a specific folder. Specifying AllItems would return all messages from the entire mailbox

api_list.name: deleteAttachments
api_list.description: Delete the specified attachment of a message. The attachment can be a file attachment or item attachment.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: deleteFolder
api_list.description: Delete a folder and its contents

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: deleteMessage
api_list.description: Delete a message.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: deleteSenderOverride
api_list.description: Delete an override specified by its ID.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: The user's email address.

api_list.name: getAccessToken
api_list.description: Get access token

api_list.name: getAllUserOverrides
api_list.description: Get the overrides that a user has set up to always classify messages from certain senders in specific ways.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: The user's email address.

api_list.name: getAttachments
api_list.description: You can get an attachment collection.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: select
optional_parameters.description: Use $select to specify only those properties you need for best performance.

api_list.name: getAutoReplySettings
api_list.description: Get the automatic reply settings of the signed-in user's mailbox.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: getFolders
api_list.description: Get the folder collection under the root folder of the signed-in user (.../me/MailFolders), or under the specified folder.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: folderId
optional_parameters.description: The folder ID, or the Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, or DeletedItems well-known folder name, if you're getting messages from a specific folder. Specifying AllItems would return all messages from the entire mailbox

api_list.name: getMailboxSettings
api_list.description: Get the settings for the primary mailbox of the signed-in user. Examples of settings include the user's preferred language and default time zone, and any automatic reply settings.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: getMessages
api_list.description: Get a message collection from the entire mailbox of the signed-in user (including the Deleted Items and Clutter folders).

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: folderId
optional_parameters.description: The folder ID, or the Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, or DeletedItems well-known folder name, if you're getting messages from a specific folder. Specifying AllItems would return all messages from the entire mailbox

optional_parameters.name: select
optional_parameters.description: Specify only those properties you need for best performance: Sender, Subject etc

api_list.name: getSingleAttachment
api_list.description: You can get single attachment.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: select
optional_parameters.description: Use $select to specify only those properties you need for best performance.

api_list.name: getSingleMessage
api_list.description: Get a message by ID.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: moveFolder
api_list.description: Move a folder and its contents to another folder

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

required_parameters.name: destinationId
required_parameters.description: The destination folder ID, or the Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, or DeletedItems well-known folder name.

api_list.name: moveMessage
api_list.description: Move a message to a folder. This creates a new copy of the message in the destination folder.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

required_parameters.name: destinationId
required_parameters.description: The destination folder ID, or the Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, or DeletedItems well-known folder name.

api_list.name: replyToAllRecipients
api_list.description: Reply to all recipients of a message by specifying a comment

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: replyToSender
api_list.description: Reply to the sender of a message by specifying a comment

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: sendDraftMessage
api_list.description: Create a draft of a new message.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: sendMessage
api_list.description: Send the message supplied in the request body

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: savetoSentItems
optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether to save the message in Sent Items. Default is true.

api_list.name: sendSimpleMessage
api_list.description: Send a new message.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: savetoSentItems
optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether to save the message in Sent Items. Default is true.

api_list.name: synchronizeFolderHierarchy
api_list.description: You can get a flat table of all folders in a mailbox. When you synchronize a mail folder hierarchy, request this category.

required_parameters.name: deltaLink
required_parameters.description: The token that indicates the last time that the folder hierarchy was synchronized.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: synchronizeMessages
api_list.description: You can synchronize your local data store with the messages on the server. Message synchronization is a per-folder operation, for example, you can synchronize all of the messages in your Inbox. To synchronize the messages in a folder hierarchy you need to synchronize each folder individually.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: deltaToken
optional_parameters.description: The token that identifies the last sync request for that folder. It is returned as part of the value for @odata.deltaLink in that previous sync response. Required for the second GET request.

optional_parameters.name: skipToken
optional_parameters.description: The token that indicates that there are more messages to download. Required if it is returned as part of the value for @odata.nextLink in the previous sync response.

optional_parameters.name: folderId
optional_parameters.description: The folder ID, or the Inbox, Drafts, SentItems, or DeletedItems well-known folder name, if you're getting messages from a specific folder. Specifying AllItems would return all messages from the entire mailbox

api_list.name: updateAutoReplySettings
api_list.description: Automatic replies are part of the user's mailbox settings (represented by MailboxSettings). You can enable, configure, or disable automatic replies by updating the corresponding mailbox settings.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: updateFolder
api_list.description: Change the folder name to that specified in displayName.

required_parameters.name: displayName
required_parameters.description: The display name of the folder.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: updateMessage
api_list.description: Change writable properties on a draft or existing message. Only the properties that you specify are changed.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

api_list.name: updateMessageClassification
api_list.description: Change the InferenceClassification property of the specified message.

required_parameters.name: inferenceClassification
required_parameters.description: Inference classification property of the message

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: The user's email address.

api_list.name: updateOverrideForSender
api_list.description: Change the classifyAs field of an override as specified.

required_parameters.name: classifyAs
required_parameters.description: Specifies how incoming messages from a specific sender should always be classified as.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access token received from Outlook Mail

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: The user's email address.
